title: Baystate Health Connect
description:
See your Baystate Health provider on your mobile device.  Baystate Health Connect brings healthcare to your home so that you can feel better, heal, and recover without having to travel into the office or find parking.

Baystate Health takes your privacy very seriously. Your visit with the doctor is secure and HIPAA compliant.

If you use Apple Health, you can choose to share your health information with the doctor during your video visit, such as heart rate, blood pressure, body temperature, blood glucose levels, weight, nutritional information, and respiratory rate.
descriptionHTML:
See your Baystate Health provider on your mobile device. Baystate Health Connect brings healthcare to your home so that you can feel better, heal, and recover without having to travel into the office or find parking.

Baystate Health takes your privacy very seriously. Your visit with the doctor is secure and HIPAA compliant.

If you use Apple Health, you can choose to share your health information with the doctor during your video visit, such as heart rate, blood pressure, body temperature, blood glucose levels, weight, nutritional information, and respiratory rate.
summary: See your Baystate provider on your mobile device from the comfort of home.

recentChanges:
We continue to improve the patient experience with these new features:
• Performance enhancements to increase reliability and speed

comments: Service is excellent as i have immunity issues so I dont have to worry about going into hospital-like setting. I have the best therapist who has helped so very mich. Service allows to continue therapy without risk. This session,tho, we had technical issues with sound cutting in & out, also freeze frames. Thank You!
Video & audio were very clear, it was like being right in the office with my PCP. It was easier than having to drive in, and safer than going out in inclement weather.
It used to work, and now the last 2 times it doesn't even show I have an appointment .
Awesome and easy i strongly recommend if you feel un easy about covid .
Great experience, very clear visually, conversation great.
Very easy to use! No issues.
Easy-to-use and convenient..i love it
A flawless visit without being there
App worked flawlessly. Just clicked the link my provider sent me, and use my fingerprint to log in, and voila! It worked!

Pretty good way to talk to the doctor and do a quick follow-up. If you are having a follow up to dosage changes or an injury or just don't have the mobility to get to the doctor's office, this is the app for you. Every doctor in the Baystate network should be able to connect with their patients with this app. The new way to do healthcare.
Can't pull up provider's name on message page. Going try baystate medical app.
Easy to log in and maneuver, I am not computer savvy, but the entire procedure was so easy, and lastly there was ample time to discuss all my concerns with my doctor. I rate this app 5 stars!!!!
Very smooth, new user so I dont know if the service allows for notes but that would be nice.
Very easy to use. I had a great experience using this app for a remote consultation with my PCP. The call quality was good and I had no trouble logging in to the app and getting set up.
I love this app because it so convenient to have a follow up conversation face to face with my doctor on the video call feature.
Very easy to use.
I was pleasantly surprised Very easy . worked very well.
So polite, helpful, got seen right away. Doc saw the problem and wrote me a scrip. Very good experience!
Exceptional and amazingly awesome. Very professional and connectivity is fantastic.
Great platform. Easy to use.
Easy to setup and use.
Sorry for saying I couldn't get in, I did get to the app on my tablet and it was very easy and I'm being seen today, thanks
It's great to be able to stay in contact with my doctor this way.
It was nice to review my prescription meds and bloodwork.
It great thing to have when you can't make it to doctors office
Terrible, does not work at all.
Love my doctor. He works with me and gives got advice.
Awesome!! this is my first experience doing this. Thanks for the opportunity
Didn't have to leave my house. Thoroughly Answered all my questions.
Marvelous i didnt know that i can talk my doctor this way!!!!
My setion kept getting stalled and my therapist was a trooper she hung in there until the end
Doctor recommended ER admission.
I'm satisfied and happy
Good app
Pleasure
Works great.
Very good
Excellent
Excellent
Excellent 👍
